name: Shape Shooter (itch) (Gigabyte Games)
description:
Welcome to Shape Shooter.

In this extremely cool-looking game, you will play as a circle at war with the triangles. Explore different shapes with different functionalities as you play 10 levels filled with fun.

The controls are simple. Use your mouse to aim and shoot!

P. S. There is a skip functionality but don't skip every single level, please.
